reviews.text: My father booked this hotel based on the price and location. I was very concerned after reading some terrible reviews, especially as I would have my 2 small children with me. However I didn't find it as bad as all that. Our room was very basic but we had plenty of space and it was clean. Truly this was all that we needed, as it was just a bed for the night after all, and we slept very well too.
reviews.title: Cheap but tolerable

likes.disliked: — Very basic - I like things pretty

reviews.text: I certainly wouldn't recommend it if you wanted a romantic break or planned to spend any time at the hotel, but as a bed in a great location it served its purpose.
reviews.title: OK for the price--but still not really worth it
Hotel Rive Gauche, Paris - not 2* standard
reviews.text: Location: Excellent. It is in the 6th and is across the river from the Louvre. This is a nice area that has just the right mix of locals and tourists.

reviews.title: ok for what you pay
reviews.text: Room size and quality: Small and old. Getting into bed is a trick. The shower is a small stand up stall with only a handheld shower nozzle. They had a crummy old TV that received only a couple of blurry channels. There is no air conditioning, of course. Sleeping with the window open could be tough due to street noise.
